abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed five-year project will
            support:  (a) economic and financial studies to define a
            short-term consolidation program and a medium-term
            structural reform program for Niger.  (b) It will also
            support institutional development to  improve the financial
            and economic planning and management capabilities of the
            Ministries of Plan and Finance, which will have the prime
            responsibility for implementing these adjustment programs.
            Studies include: (a) a review of the public investment
            program, the public debt and the government financial
            situation; (b) a diagnostic study of the parastatal sector
            and follow-up studies to define rehabilitation programs for
            selected public enterprises; and (c) macroeconomic and
            sectoral studies to define a structural adjustment program.
            Institutional-development assistance will: (a) strengthen
            the Statistical and the Public Investment Departments of the
            Ministry of Plan, (b) establish a new Financial Planning
            Department and strengthen the Public Debt Department and the
            Fiscal Management Administration of the Ministry of Finance.
            Furthermore, it will (c) provide training to improve
            staffing of key departments of the two ministries.
